meanings.definition: Without regard to or consideration of
meanings.sent1: She decided to go for a run, irrespective of the rain.
meanings.sent2: He always treats everyone kindly, irrespective of their background.
meanings.sent3: The cat continued napping, irrespective of the noisy vacuum cleaner.
meanings.sent4: His passion for music soared, irrespective of the challenges he faced.
meanings.sent5: The flowers bloomed beautifully, irrespective of the harsh weather conditions.
